title: Crispy Parmesan roast potatoes
ingredients: ['cooking spray', '1 teaspoon vegetable oil', '900g red potatoes, halved', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '2 tablespoons freshly grated Parmesan cheese', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon garlic powder', '1/2 teaspoon paprika', '1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper', '4 tablespoons soured cream, to serve (optional)']
